metadata.name: Dwindling Light
metadata.description:
Title: Dwindling Light

Resolution: 3712x4640px

Editions: 1/1

Location: Peak District, UK

.

"I was out on one of my many jaunts through the countryside sometime late summer, last year & Happened upon this scene, I loved the light glowing the gate up and the depth created by the scale of the foreground to the trees leading up the path towards the backdrop. Originally a colour edit & After coming across it in my library I decided it needed this achromatic edit, This photograph & the edit speaks to me in a language I can feel more than interpret."

.

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries, and essays by the holder of the NFT, as long as the creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with the creator.
